mapper.select: SELECT `ARTWORK_NO`, `TITLE`, `ARTIST_NO`, `ARTIST_NAME_KOR`, `ARTIST_NAME_ENG`, `CATEGORY_NO`, `CATEGORY_NAME`, `MEDIA`, `EXPLAIN`, `ARTWORK_DATE`, `MAIN_IMAGE_NO`, `MAIN_IMAGE_NAME`, `MAIN_THUM1_NAME`, `MAIN_THUM2_NAME`, `APPRAISE_NO`, `APPRAISE_NAME`, `APPRAISE_COMMENT`, `APPRAISE_VALUE`, `SELL_VALUE`, `ORDER_YN`, `ORDER_NO`, `STORAGE_YN`, `SHOW_YN`, `DELETE_YN`, `REG_DATE`, `EDIT_DATE`, `HIT` FROM artwork_view ORDER BY `REG_DATE` DESC
